annotations.description: It's Repeal Day, December 5th, and to celebrate I'm talking a little about Prohibition and making SIX drinks to help you party like Gatsby! Way back in 1933 ...
annotations.title: The Drinks of Prohibition! Repeal Day Special! | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml Lemon Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Honey Syrup
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. London Dry Gin

Shake & Strain
Garnish with Candied Ginger

title: Bees Knees
